import React from "react"; export function AboutSection() { return (

About DayStarConnect

DayStarConnect is a comprehensive childcare management system designed to help daycare centers streamline their operations and provide better care for children.

Our Mission

To provide innovative solutions that enhance the quality of childcare services and make daycare management easier and more efficient.

Our Vision

To become the leading childcare management solution in Zambia, empowering daycare centers to provide exceptional care and education.

Our Values

We believe in excellence, innovation, and putting the needs of children and caregivers first in everything we do.

); }
